title: Anyone else got Honour level 4 yet?

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: So I just hit honour level 4 at 6:44 PM 10/08/17. Just wondering if anybody else has gotten this yet? (Also still no capsule drops, FeelsBadMan)

replies.body:
Well done! It's good to see people so excited about gaining Honour levels, really brings back some faith that the community wont go downhill.

That said, I'm a little surprised people have already started getting Honour level 4, I would've thought it would take a bit longer (even for those putting several games per day). Maybe it's just easier to get level 4/5 than level 3? Or maybe Riot had progress "restricted" for a few weeks to make sure everything was working properly, and it's just not as difficult to gain levels as it has appeared so far?

Great, now my curiosity is getting the better of me... I should ask someone what the go is.

I am almost certain that this is true, since honour level ups seem to be happening in waves, despite players playing at different rates and getting various honour frequencies. I also may have seen an account that only played 10 games to get honour level 3 at the same time as an account that got honoured more frequently even, over 50 games.
You're mind f*cking me, pls stop

I've been lvl 4 for a few days now, I have received 2 honour capsules total (one when I was lvl 3), and I've opened Ashe champion shard and Sivir champion shard. So.Much.Wow.

Honour capsules suck.

Cause everyone hates free stuff.

It's the same as hextech crafting, you might get SG Udyr or Ele Lux, or you might get a champion shard for someone you already own or have no desire to. Such is RNG.

> [{quoted}](name=Seras Dragon,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=MFcVGe4s,comment-id=00070000,timestamp=2017-08-15T02:02:20.344+0000)
>
> Cause everyone hates free stuff.
> 
> It's the same as hextech crafting, you might get SG Udyr or Ele Lux, or you might get a champion shard for someone you already own or have no desire to. Such is RNG.

I've had great luck with hextech crafting, 2/3rds of my chests have been skin shards. RNG is apparently random, who would have guessed?

I don't even have Level 3 T_T but unlike you I haven't played 40 games in the past 2 weeks.

**Good on you, though :D**
Thanks very much :) :) Goodluck on level 3!

Congrats!

I have just managed to get it too. :)

I just arrived Honor lv.4 today, a little later than you :D 
[(http://i.imgur.com/0ewYaWO.png)]
And I'm the really lucky one, I got the Grey Warwick skin from my first honor capsule dropped in honor lv.3 :P
[(http://i.imgur.com/4t4BPwo.png)]
I got it the other day, I made a post about it also :D http://imgur.com/a/Jyr8Z (proof)
